channel.title: Pointers on Computer Science 101
channel.description: Recent content in Pointers on Computer Science 101

item.title: C++ Pointers
item.description: C++ Pointers # We have worked in C# so far, so you may wonder why C++ all of a sudden? The answer is simple, C# will allow us to work with references / pointers, however it will hide some details from us. To discover these details and to make things more clear, but also more confusing at first, we want to dive in and take a short detour to C++ to explore this subject in depth.
